definitions.definition: a sweet substance especially from the plants sugar cane and sugar beet, used to make food and drinks sweet:
examples: I don't take sugar in my coffee, thanks.

definitions.definition: any of several types of simple carbohydrate that dissolves in water:
a friendly way of talking to someone that you know:
examples: Hi, sugar, did you have a good day at school?

definitions.definition: polite word for  shit noun , used when something annoying happens:
examples: Oh sugar, I've just spilled coffee all down my jacket!

definitions.definition: to put sugar in or on something:
examples: He sugared the rims of the martini glasses.
